vote.title: To rename the roadway currently known as Edward Street, from the east right-of-way line of Hamilton Avenue to the west right-of-way line of Saint Clair Avenue, to “Otha Gilyard Street”. ($0.00)
vote.description:
Explanation
1.                     Background
The Department of Public Service, Division of Infrastructure Management, recently received a request from Shiloh Baptist Church to rename the roadway currently known as Edward Street, from the east right-of-way line of Hamilton Avenue to the west right-of-way line of Saint Clair Avenue, to “Otha Gilyard Street”.  
 
The aforementioned request will allow the abutting property owner(s) to honor the late Reverend Dr. Otha Gilyard. The proposed name, “Otha Gilyard Street”, conforms to the Division’s current street naming policies and has been reserved until such time that this request has been completed, or denied.  The Division of Infrastructure Management has circulated concurrent notification to the City agencies without objection.  Shiloh Baptist Church has satisfactorily completed all of the requirements for renaming of a city street and has agreed to pay associated cost for removing existing street name signs and installing new signs reflecting said street name at the required location(s) of Otha Gilyard Street.
 
2.                     Fiscal Impact
There is no fiscal impact to renaming the street.
 
Title
To rename the roadway currently known as Edward Street, from the east right-of-way line of Hamilton Avenue to the west right-of-way line of Saint Clair Avenue, to “Otha Gilyard Street”. ($0.00)
 
Body
WHEREAS, the Department of Public Service, Division of Infrastructure Management recently received a request from Shiloh Baptist Church to rename the roadway currently known as Edward Street, from the east right-of-way line of Hamilton Avenue to the west right-of-way line of Saint Clair Avenue, to “Otha Gilyard Street”; and
 
WHEREAS, the request will allow the abutting property owner(s) to honor the late Reverend Dr. Otha Gilyard; and
 
WHEREAS, the proposed name, “Otha Gilyard Street”, conforms to the Division’s current street naming policies and has been reserved until such time that this request has been completed, or denied; and
 
WHEREAS, the Division of Infrastructure Management has circulated concurrent notification to the City agencies without objection; and
 
WHEREAS, Shiloh Baptist Church has satisfactorily completed all of the requirements for renaming of a city street and has agreed to pay associated cost for removing existing street name signs and installing new signs reflecting said street name at the required location(s) of Otha Gilyard Street; now, therefore
 
BE IT ORDAINED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
 
Section 1.  That the City of Columbus herby renames the section of Edward Street, from the east right-of-way line of Hamilton Avenue to the west right-of-way line of Saint Clair Avenue, to “Otha Gilyard Street”.
 
Section 2.  That this ordinance shall take place and be in force from and after the earliest period allowed by law.
